pkgmetadata.longdescription: Empirical Mode Decomposition Based Artificial Neural Network Model // Application of empirical mode decomposition based artificial neural network model for nonlinear and non stationary univariate time series forecasting. For method details see (i) Choudhury (2019) https://www.indianjournals.com /ijor.aspx?target=ijor:ijee3volume=55issue=1article=013; (ii) Das (2020) https://www.indianjournals.com/ijor.aspx?target=ijor :ijee3volume=56issue=2article=002.
